Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle rising to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '17'. Name Gorgias. Uncommon. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0336.09.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (151)
